item.title: #23 - Dating
#19 - Estrangement
item.description: The Question: What do you enjoy most about your day? The Topic: Let’s talk about estrangement. The Viewermail: I help feed some hungry people.

item.title: #19 - Estrangement
item.description: the_question What do you enjoy most about your day? Maybe you enjoy that morning coffee, along with a hand-rolled cigarette. Maybe it’s just doing what it is that you love doing? Playing video games, working. For me it’s just the process of seeing myself grow and progress. Weight lifting and just pushing myself. To see that I’m just a bit further along with my life than I was before. It helps create a sense of hope.

item.title: #8 - Monogamy
item.description: The Question: What do you do really well? The Topic: Stayin’ with da one gal. The Viewermail: I help a woman conceive.

item.title: #8 - Monogamy
item.description: the_question What do you do really well? I give great handjobs. Maybe you’re really talented at the piano or you’re really good at art. Perhaps you’re just the_topic Today we’re talking about Spotify (or music streaming) It sort of just happened. I can’t remember music before streaming. I do remember being very skeptical about it at first. the_viewermail Mira from Khon Kaen, Thailand “Hey Julius, lovin’ the show.
